CLBConfig.RunR:
X = Solver$Geometry$X - 0.5 Y = Solver$Geometry$Y - 0.5
L = max(X) X = X / L - 0.5 Y = Y / L Y = Y - 0.5 * max(Y)
R = sqrt(X^2 + Y^2) Theta = atan2(Y,X) c1 = 60 c2 = 0.0001
Solver$Fields$`BC[1]` = cos(Theta) * exp(-c1*R^2) * c2 Solver$Fields$`BC[0]` = -sin(Theta) * exp(-c1*R^2) * c2
